vision.statement: Make intelligent data analysis accessible to everyone through a simple, powerful CLI platform
vision.mission: Transform how people interact with their data by combining the power of AI with the simplicity of command-line tools
vision.approach: Build a plugin-based platform where the community can create and share intelligence services

milestones.title: Project Foundation & Architecture
milestones.description: Established the technical foundation and architecture for the platform. Defined the plugin system design, chose the technology stack, and created development standards to ensure rapid, sustainable development.
deliverables: Technical architecture documentation
Plugin system design and API specifications
Development environment setup with hot-reload
Project roadmap and milestone planning

milestones.title: Core CLI Platform MVP
milestones.description: Building the foundational web-based CLI with hot-reloadable plugin architecture. This enables rapid development of intelligence services without complex setup. Users interact with AI-powered tools through simple, familiar command-line syntax.
deliverables: Web terminal interface with real-time WebSocket communication
Hot-reloadable plugin system supporting Python modules
User authentication and secure session management
PostgreSQL database with Row-Level Security for multi-tenancy
Basic CLI commands, help system, and auto-completion

milestones.title: Goal Helper Plugin Beta
milestones.description: AI-powered goal setting and coaching plugin demonstrating the platform's ability to provide personalized intelligence. Helps users break down ambitious goals into actionable steps with regular check-ins and motivational support based on progress patterns.
deliverables: AI-guided goal refinement using SMART framework
Milestone planning with automatic breakdown
Weekly check-in system with progress dashboards
Motivational insights based on user patterns

milestones.title: Rubber Ducky Coaching Plugin
milestones.description: Interactive problem-solving assistant using Socratic questioning to help developers and professionals think through challenges. Demonstrates the platform's conversational AI capabilities and shows how plugins can facilitate reflective thinking rather than just providing answers.
deliverables: Conversational AI using Socratic method for problem exploration
Persistent conversation history with save/resume capability
Automatic insight summarization and action items
Integration with common development workflows

milestones.title: Financial Analysis Intelligence Plugin
milestones.description: Sophisticated financial market analysis plugin showcasing real-time data integration, personalized portfolio analysis, and automated reporting. Demonstrates the platform's ability to handle complex data workflows, integrate with external APIs, and deliver valuable insights through simple commands.
deliverables: Real-time market data integration via Polygon.io API
Portfolio configuration with custom constraints and preferences
AI-powered personalized analysis and investment insights
Automated email reports with interactive Q&A capability
Natural language query system for financial data exploration

milestones.title: Personal AI Assistant Plugin
milestones.description: Transform email chaos, calendar conflicts, and task overload into organized productivity. The AI assistant handles scheduling optimization, drafts email responses, prioritizes work based on goals, and prepares meeting briefings—demonstrating the platform's ability to automate and enhance personal productivity workflows.
deliverables: Intelligent email management with auto-drafting and prioritization
Calendar optimization and automated conflict resolution
Context-aware task prioritization aligned with user goals
Automated meeting preparation with talking points and briefings
Multi-platform integration (Gmail, Outlook, Google Calendar)

milestones.title: Educational Personalization Plugin
milestones.description: Personalized learning paths powered by AI that adapt to individual pace, style, and goals. Interactive lessons with real-time feedback, progress tracking, and multi-modal learning demonstrate how the platform can democratize education and skill development through intelligent tutoring.
deliverables: Personalized learning path generation based on skill level and goals
Interactive lessons with code execution and visualizations
AI-powered feedback on practice problems and assignments
Progress tracking with strength/weakness analysis
Career-focused tracks and certification preparation support

milestones.title: Private Beta Launch
milestones.description: Launch controlled beta program to validate product-market fit with early adopters. Gather detailed feedback on core platform and initial plugins to refine user experience, fix bugs, and optimize performance before public launch. Focus on understanding which plugin types resonate most with users.
deliverables: Comprehensive onboarding system with interactive tutorials
Multi-channel feedback collection (surveys, usage analytics, interviews)
Performance optimization based on real usage patterns
Bug fixes and UX improvements from user testing
Beta user case studies documenting real-world value

milestones.title: Plugin Marketplace Foundation
milestones.description: Build marketplace infrastructure enabling third-party developers to create, publish, and share plugins. This is the key differentiator - creating an ecosystem where the community extends platform capabilities. Developers can build specialized intelligence services for niche use cases we haven't imagined.
deliverables: Plugin submission and review workflow for quality assurance
Comprehensive developer portal with SDK documentation and examples
Plugin discovery system with search, categories, and ratings
Developer analytics showing plugin usage and performance
Plugin versioning and safe update system

milestones.title: Advanced Plugin Suite Launch
milestones.description: Launch sophisticated plugins demonstrating the platform's capability to handle complex, specialized workflows. Multi-Agent Orchestration enables distributed intelligence for research tasks, while Healthcare Administrative Intelligence showcases industry-specific automation—both highlighting the platform's B2B potential and technical differentiation.
deliverables: Multi-Agent Orchestration: Spawn and coordinate multiple AI agents for parallel workflows
Healthcare Administrative Intelligence: Automate claims processing and prior authorization
Agent network monitoring with real-time status and progress tracking
HIPAA-compliant data handling with healthcare system integrations
Cost optimization and intelligent scheduling for agent workflows

milestones.title: Public Platform Launch
milestones.description: Public launch with polished user experience and production-ready infrastructure. Make the platform available to anyone who wants to leverage AI-powered intelligence services. Focus on clear value demonstration and smooth onboarding to convert visitors into engaged users.
deliverables: Production infrastructure with monitoring and auto-scaling
Professional marketing website with clear value proposition
Comprehensive video tutorials and interactive guides
Customer support system with knowledge base
Multi-channel launch campaigns (Product Hunt, social media, communities)

milestones.title: Plugin Ecosystem Expansion
milestones.description: Grow the plugin ecosystem with both first-party and third-party plugins spanning diverse use cases. Demonstrate the platform's versatility and the power of community-driven intelligence services. Each new plugin category attracts a new user segment and creates network effects.
deliverables: Government & Enterprise Compliance: FedRAMP preparation and regulatory analysis
Scientific Computing Intelligence: Experiment design and optimization for researchers
Video-as-Primitive Tools: On-demand video generation infrastructure
Design Automation Intelligence: AI-powered UI generation and design systems
Community-contributed plugins across health, e-commerce, social media, and academic domains
